patterns: What growth milestones should you expect in your 4-month-old?
In which month my baby's growth will increase
responses: By month four, your baby’s weight will likely have doubled from birth.
By month four

patterns: Why do I need folic acid?
responses: Folic acid is crucial to your baby's development in the early stages of pregnancy.

patterns: What are some tips for my baby’s fourth month?
Give some tips to my fourth month baby
responses: Give your baby lots of new textures to explore
Spend at least a few minutes reading or singing to your baby every day

patterns: What sleep milestones should i expect in my baby's 5-month-old?
What sleep milestones should i expect in your 5-month-old?
responses: Most babies sleep through the night by five months, but not all

patterns: Help me! my baby is sick
responses: What is your baby complaining about?

patterns: What to do when toddler has fever?
responses: Dress your child lightly,Encourage your child to drink plenty of fluids,Give your child a lukewarm bath and if your baby don't be better , Visit us!

patterns: Does baby eczema go away by itself?
What can i do to treat baby eczema at home?
responses: Most children outgrow it before they start school.Giving your baby a short warm bath,Use an ointment and if your baby don't be better , Visit us!

patterns: Is dry, peeling skin normal in newborns?
My baby has dry, peeling skin, is it normal?
responses: Almost all babies can have some dry, peeling skin

patterns: What should I do when my baby cries?
My baby is crying and i don't know what i should do?
responses: First, troubleshoot. Is your baby hungry? Wet? Hot? In pain from a too-tight diaper. If your baby is full, clean, comfortable, and without a fever, try soothing them by swaddling and walking

patterns: What are signs of a picky eater?
responses: The symptoms of a picky eater can seem pretty obvious: Your baby may push away the spoon or turn his head from it or might close her mouth as you try feeding her
We are open 7am-12pm saturday-Friday!.. and for emergency call 01044914310!

patterns: How well can newborn babies see?
responses: Babies are born with a full visual capacity to see objects and colors. However, newborns cannot see very far -- only objects that are 8-15 inches away

patterns: How can I ease my baby's teething pain?
responses: Let your baby chew on a clean, cool teething ring or cold washcloth
It's a messy phase when baby seems to spend more time playing with or dropping food than eating it,this step is important in helping your baby become more self-reliant.
